content: One -- first, we expect to see our growth drivers of data center, PON, 5G wireless regain their growth momentum as the business environment normalizes, but more importantly, become more regionally balanced as we see revenue run for these products in North America later this year; second, Sierraâs cellular capabilities, combined with our high-margin LoRa and LoRa Cloud technology, we open up new market opportunities for both technologies, driving increased revenues, gross and operating margins for the Company; and finally, once we have executed on our synergies and portfolio review, we expect that in fiscal year â25, we will start seeing much improved margin expansion and EPS growth.
